devdoc.author: Impossible Finance

params.tokenId: The loyalty card to add points to

burn(uint256).details: Following OZ's pattern: _burn() can only be called by the token owner or an approved party. Additionally, we say that the approved party must be our burner.

params.tokenId: The id of the token to be burned.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.tokenId: The loyalty card to redeem points from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Loyalty Points Cards NFTs for Impossible Finance users.

addDestination(address).notice: Adds a destination to the whitelisted destinations

addOperator(address).notice: Adds an operator to the whitelisted operators

addPoints(uint256,uint256).notice: Add loyalty points to a given card

burn(uint256).notice: Burns a token with given tokenId

currentPoints(uint256).notice: Retrieve current number of points this card has

isDestination(address).notice: Returns whether given address may be receiver of tokens via transfer

isOperator(address).notice: Returns whether given address may operate

mint(address).notice: Mint a new card to given account

redeemPoints(uint256,uint256).notice: Redeem loyalty points from a card

removeDestination(address).notice: Removes a destination from the whitelisted destinations

removeOperator(address).notice: Removes an operator from the whitelisted operators

totalPoints(uint256).notice: Retrieve total number of points this card has accumulated historically

userdoc.notice: Minting only allowed for specific minterThe cards are not transferrable except for whitelisted destinations.The cards can be burned.The cards acccumulate points which can be redeemed. Only whitelisted operators are allowed to do so.This contract has no knowledge of particular benefits.Benefits for redeeming loyalty points are handled entirely by operating contracts.Benefits operators have to ensure that, when redeeming, they deduct correct point amounts and give the benefits accordingly.
